pages.text: After using a stick on the flag base, you should have a shiny new TOWN WAND!$(br2)But what does this wand do?$(br2)BE PATIENT! I'M GETTING THERE!$(br2)Let's start by building a room for our guest. Villagers are quite picky, so keep it simple. Let's build a small, square room with a door.

Once you've got all four walls and the door built, try using the wand on the door!$(br2)Hint: Right-click the door of a room with the TOWN WAND in hand.$(br2)Hint: Go to the next page to see an example.
Hint: Rooms should have four walls (at least 2 blocks tall) and a door. For best results, build them near the town flag.
